lead_paragraph: The New York region celebrated a solemn and sun-drenched Memorial Day, with salutes, parades and visits to parks and beaches.
snippet: The New York region celebrated a solemn and sun-drenched Memorial Day, with salutes, parades and visits to parks and beaches.

headline.main: Reflection, Relaxation and a Taste of Summer
headline.seo: A Solemn and Sun-Drenched Memorial Day in New York
headline.print_headline: Reflection, Relaxation And a Taste Of Summer

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Karen DeMasters, Ann Farmer, Mick Meenan, Colin Moynihan and Nate Schweber.
